message.entry: Setting property ''Location'' and ''Position'' at the same time is not supported.
Number of columns/rows of input data must match value of ''NumChannels''.
Invalid input. Input uipanel must be empty with no children.
신호를 생성하기 전에 시간 스코프 창을 열어야 합니다.
Signal being removed is not created by the current Time Scope.
Input time and value for input signal {0} must have the same length.
Input time and value for a signal must have the same length.
시간 스코프가 실행 중일 때 XLimits를 수동으로 설정할 수 없습니다.
Length of YAxesInfo must match value of NumChannels. Changing NumChannels will reset this property.
Length of LineProperties must match value of NumChannels. Changing NumChannels will reset this property.
